text: Paradela is a former parish in the municipality of Miranda do Douro, Portugal. The population in 2011 was 160,Instituto Nacional de Estatística in an area of 13.84 km². In 2013, the parish merged with Ifanes to form the new parish Ifanes e Paradela. ==References== Category:Parishes of Miranda do Douro Category:Former parishes of Portugal
title: Paradela (Miranda do Douro)
